publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1665 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Approval of Ordersâ€”That the Parliament agrees that the following Orders be approved: The Code of Representations for the Welfare of Livestock: Sheep (SSI 2001/58) and, The Budget (Scotland) Act 2000 (Amendment) (No.2) Order 2001 (Draft) and, The Number of Inner House Judges (Variation) Order 2001 (Draft) and, The Advice and Assistance (Assistance by Way of Representation) (Scotland) Amendment (No. 2) Regulations 2001 (Draft).
